title:
Cordless Handheld Standard Range Area Imager Kit with Presentation Cradle and USB Kit, Black,
Compatible Devices: Laptop, Desktop, Power Source: Corded Electric, Usb Cable, 3 AAA batteries required.
descriptions:
Introducing the Cordless Handheld Standard Range Area Imager Kit with Presentation Cradle and USB Kit from Zebra - your ultimate companion for Retail and Hospitality industries!

This sleek and sophisticated 1D/2D imager offers unmatched versatility, as it is compatible with both laptops and desktops. With multiple power source options including corded electric, USB cable, and three AAA batteries, you have the flexibility to scan on-the-go or while tethered to a power source.

Embrace the comfort of its ergonomic design, making scanning sessions long or short an absolute breeze! Weighing in at a lightweight build, this handheld imager is perfect for those constant movements around your workplace.

Featuring omni-directional scanning capabilities, swiftly and accurately capture data from virtually any angle, without the need to adjust your device. Plus, aim line guidance ensures precise placement every time, maximizing efficiency and minimizing errors.

Pre-configured for seamless integration with your existing systems, this kit comes with an auto-host cable that simplifies setup and eliminates the hassle of manual configuration. And with its presentation cradle and USB kit, this imager is not just a tool, but an essential accessory for showcasing barcodes in style.

Upgrade your scanning game today with Zebra's Cordless Handheld Standard Range Area Imager Kit ‚Äì the ultimate solution for Retail and Hospitality professionals!

‚ú® Introducing the Cordless Handheld Standard Range Area Imager Kit from Zebra - your ultimate solution for fast and accurate barcode scanning in retail and hospitality industries! ‚ú®

This sleek, Black kit comes with a Presentation Cradle and USB Kit, making it compatible with both Laptop and Desktop devices. Powered by Corded Electric or USB Cable, and three AAA batteries for on-the-go convenience, this imager is versatile and reliable.

Boasting an ergonomic design and lightweight build, our Handheld Area Imager fits comfortably in your hand while delivering omni-directional scanning capabilities. With pre-configured settings and auto-host cables, setup is a breeze!

Key Features:
- 1D/2D Imager: Scan all barcode types with ease
- Omni-Directional Scanning: Quickly capture data from any angle
- Aim Line Guidance: Ensure accurate placement for perfect scans every time
- Pre-configured: Ready to go right out of the box
- Auto-host Cables: Seamless connectivity with your device

Experience ultimate convenience with this ergonomic and lightweight imager kit. Its omni-directional scanning feature allows you to scan barcodes effortlessly from any angle ‚Äì saving you time and increasing productivity. Pre-configured for your ease of use, it comes with auto-host cables, making setup a breeze.

Equipped with the latest 1D/2D imaging technology from Zebra, this scanner is designed to handle all your general purpose scanning needs. With its compact and handheld design, you can easily carry it around in your workspace or present it professionally using the included presentation cradle.

Upgrade your business operations with the Cordless Handheld Standard Range Area Imager Kit ‚Äì perfect for retailers, restaurateurs, and anyone who values speed and accuracy in their work. Order yours today!
